## Data description
We have two files:

  - The **targets** file
  - The **expression matrix** file


```{r}
targets<-read.csv("targets.txt",header = T)
expression<-read.delim("expression.txt")
```

```{r}
show(targets)
```

```{r}
dim(expression)
summary(expression)
```

```{r}
boxplot(expression)
```

```{r}
boxplot(expression,col=c(2,2,3,3,4,4,5,5))
```

```{r}
boxplot(expression,col=targets$Color)
```
